scripts.dev: pnpm start-db && sam build && cross-env AWS_SAM_LOCAL=true sam local start-api --docker-network local-dev
scripts.start-db: (docker network create local-dev || echo created) && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && aws dynamodb create-table --region ap-southeast-2 --endpoint http://localhost:8000 --cli-input-json file://db-table-cli.json
